metadata.title: CVE-2022-41844 on Ubuntu 18.04 FIPS Certified (bionic) - medium
metadata.description: An issue was discovered in Xpdf 4.04. There is a crash in XRef::fetch(int,int, Object*, int) in xpdf/XRef.cc, a different vulnerability thanCVE-2018-16369 and CVE-2019-16088.

criterions.comment: ipe: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needs-triage').
